subject: Real Estate
title: Space Real Estate: Who Owns the Moon?
description: A short lesson to help you apply Space Real Estate: Who Owns the Moon?.

hook.text: A company called Lunar Embassy has sold 'acres' on the Moon to millions of people. It's legally meaningless.

buildup.text: The 1967 Outer Space Treaty says no nation can claim celestial territory. But it says nothing about companies.

discovery.text: NASA and SpaceX plan permanent Moon bases. The question of lunar property rights will need real answers soon.
